description: Number of symmetries in planted (1,4) trees on 3n-1 vertices.
references: Kathleen A. McKeon, The expected number of symmetries in locally-restricted trees I, pp. 849-860 of Y. Alavi et al., eds., Graph Theory, Combinatorics and Applications. Wiley, NY, 2 vols., 1991.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).

author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
